column4: hey. everytime  i wanna use apt-get update he stays at 0% and trys to connect to 192.168.23.1 which is the proxy in our school, but in the global proxy config the proxy is disabled because at home i dont need it.

hey. everytime  i wanna use apt-get update he stays at 0% and trys to connect to 192.168.23.1 which is the proxy in our school, but in the global proxy config the proxy is disabled because at home i dont need it.
Surfing in fierefox works perfectly but apt-get update not. is there any config of aptitude where i can disable the proxy?
Please don't flood, use http://paste.ubuntu.com to paste, don't use Enter as punctuation.
